item.title: Local: Useful Links
item.description:
Right now this is just a semi-organized bag of links. I will work through these for better organization and hopefully add some ratings to the links.

Transportation

  • https://www.transportation.gov/leadershipacademy/resource-library

Housing and Zoning

  • https://housingtoolkit.nmhc.org/
  • https://obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/sites/whitehouse.gov/files/images/Housing_Development_Toolkit%20f.2.pdf
  • https://lwm-info.org/DocumentCenter/View/5566/WI-Zoning-Guide-Final-2-2022
  • https://www.oecd-ilibrary.org/sites/b453b043-en/index.html?itemId=/content/publication/b453b043-en&_csp_=6c2144a214b333aaac200b082e70ed53&itemIGO=oecd&itemContentType=book
  • https://www.policylink.org/resources-tools/affordable-housing
  • https://www.myhomestead.com/sb9-city-guide
  • https://lwm-info.org/DocumentCenter/View/5566/WI-Zoning-Guide-Final-2-2022
  • https://www3.uwsp.edu/cnr-ap/clue/Pages/publications-resources/Zoning.aspx

Smart City

  • https://monum.github.io/playbook/
  • https://playbook.cio.gov/
  • https://pages.nokia.com/T003V0-what-are-cities-doing-to-be-smart.html
  • https://smartcities4all.org/
  • https://www.dustinhaisler.com/smart-cities
  • https://api.ctia.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/CTIA-Smart-Cities-Playbook.pdf

Economic

  • https://www.hudexchange.info/resource/2376/cdbg-economic-development-toolkit/

Election

  • https://city.milwaukee.gov/election/Helpmilwaukeevote/TrainingPage

Other

  • https://www.lwm-info.org/31/Resources
